Description.Text:
Welcome to the Adria Hotel; a clean, comfortable and affordable hotel ideally situated in the heart of Hammersmith, West London. Just several minutes away from local transport services, Adria is within close proximity of some of London's main attractions and is easily accessible from London's main airports.
The regularly refurbished, family run hotel ensures that each of the en-suite rooms provides modern amenities such as Freeview TV, an Electronic Safe, a Hairdryer, Tea and Coffee facilities, and complimentary Wi-Fi.
A warm welcome awaits you with friendly and attentive staff doing their absolute most to offer a superior service.
Situated in the heart of Hammersmith, Adria Hotel is ideally located for visitors to the capital due to its numerous transport services making the whole of London easily accessible.

Ensuite Twin - The Twin rooms are spacious, featuring 2 superior quality single beds, soft but firm pillows and cotton bed linen so you'll get a good night's sleep. To make your stay more enjoyable hotel provides free wireless Internet, complimentary Tea/Coffee, a room safe, essentials like TV with satellite channels, a desk with universal power sockets and a hairdryer. The ensuite shower rooms are fully tiled featuring European mixer taps, fresh towels and toiletries are provided, daily. The rooms are serviced every day.
Ensuite Single - The Single rooms are spacious, featuring a superior quality single bed, soft but firm pillows and cotton bed linen so you'll get a good night's sleep. To make your stay more enjoyable hotel provides free wireless Internet, complimentary Tea/Coffee, a room safe, essentials like TV with satellite channels, a desk with universal power sockets and a hairdryer. The ensuite shower rooms are fully tiled featuring 'European' mixer taps, fresh towels and toiletries are provided, daily. The rooms are serviced every day.
Ensuite Double - The Double rooms are spacious, featuring a superior quality Queen sized double bed, soft but firm pillows and cotton bed linen so you'll get a good night's sleep. To make your stay more enjoyable hotel provides free wireless Internet, complimentary Tea/Coffee, a room safe, essentials like TV with satellite channels, a desk with universal power sockets and a hairdryer. The ensuite shower rooms are fully tiled featuring 'European' mixer taps, fresh towels and toiletries are provided, daily. The rooms are serviced every day.
Ensuite Triple - The Triple rooms are spacious, featuring 3 superior quality single beds, soft but firm pillows and cotton bed linen so you'll get a good night's sleep. To make your stay more enjoyable hotel provides free wireless Internet, complimentary Tea/Coffee, a room safe, essentials like TV with satellite channels, a desk with universal power sockets and a hairdryer. The ensuite shower rooms are fully tiled featuring 'European' mixer taps, fresh towels and toiletries are provided, daily. The rooms are serviced every day.
Ensuite Family - The Family rooms are spacious, featuring 2 superior quality single beds and 1 Queen sized double bed, soft but firm pillows and cotton bed linen so you'll get a good night's sleep. To make your stay more enjoyable hotel provides free wireless Internet, complimentary Tea/Coffee, a room safe, essentials like TV with satellite channels, a desk with universal power sockets and a hairdryer. The ensuite shower rooms are fully tiled featuring 'European' mixer taps, fresh towels and toiletries are provided, daily. The rooms are serviced every day
2 Bedroom apartment ensuite (annexe) - The apartment is self contained and has an open plan dining/sitting room leading to a fully equipped Kitchen with facilities including fridge freezer, microwave cooker, single fan oven, 4 ring electric cooker, toaster, electric kettle, air extractor, dishwasher and a full set of pots pans, cutlery etc. The bedrooms are adjustable to give you either a double bed or 2 Single beds and ensuite shower/WC. Please specify which combination of beds you prefer. There is also a separate utility room with washing machine and dryer with an additional WC and even a small patio garden.
Annexe Ensuit Twin - The Twin rooms are spacious, featuring 2 superior quality single beds, soft but firm pillows and cotton bed linen so you'll get a good night's sleep. To make your stay more enjoyable hotel provides, complimentary Tea/Coffee, a room safe, essentials like LCD Freeview TV, universal power sockets and a hairdryer. The ensuite shower rooms are fully tiled featuring European mixer taps, fresh towels and toiletries are provided, daily. The rooms are serviced every day
